ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm known for being very slow.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You might see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and salty all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ Boats travel on me.
💧 I am made of water.
🐳 Many animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to hide.
🎨 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🖐️ Count my arms!

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I am very big, but I eat tiny creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a type of whale.
🎶 I sing a long song.
🦷 I don't have teeth.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have many different patterns.
🏠 I live where there are many colors of plants.
🤡 Some people think I look like a clown.

ocean.question: I'm a pointy star that lives under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms (usually).
💪 I can grow back an arm if I lose it.
✨ I am not really a fish.

ocean.question: I have a pouch and hop, but I live in the sea! What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look a little like a horse.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 The male carries the eggs.
🌱 I am very small and camouflaged.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, flippers, and swim in the ocean. I lay my eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🏖️ I travel long distances to lay eggs.
🥬 I eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I have many teeth and swim very fast. Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 You can sometimes see my fin above the water.
🐟 I eat other fish.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. I live in the ocean and sometimes hide in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have scales like other fish.
🏖️ I can be found near coral reefs and rocky areas.
⚡ Some kinds can give you a shock!

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am frozen.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow, and I shine in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear every morning.
😎 You need sunglasses when you look at me.
🔥 I give light and warmth.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can form puddles.
☔ I can make you wet.
🌧️ Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees, and I can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You can feel me but not see me.
🍃 I can blow your hat off.
🌬️ I make windmills turn.

weather.question: I'm white and puffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can look like animals or shapes.
🐑 I am made of tiny water droplets.
🌬️ The wind moves me.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky, but I am frozen into balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you!
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.
🤕 I am hard ice!

weather.question: I light up the sky with a flash and make a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a very bright spark.
⛈️ I come during thunderstorms.
🔊 I make a very loud noise.

weather.question: I am a big storm with a spinning cloud. I can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am shaped like a funnel.
🏠 You should take cover inside when I am near.
🌬️ I have very strong winds.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, made when the sun shines through the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌞 I appear after it rains and the sun comes out.
🎨 My colors are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am a big storm that forms over warm ocean water, with strong winds and heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I start over water.
🌀 My center is called an 'eye'.
💨 I can bring very strong winds, rain, and flooding.
